plot: Grandma brings over some delicious treats for the kids to try - only they're full of olives. Caillou doesn't like olives, but he doesn't know how to tell Grandma he doesn't like her cherished dishes... Caillou and Leo accidentally break Rosie's clay poodle while playing. Instead of telling the truth, they try to make another clay poodle for Rosie.. Mrs. Howard brings over an old train set for Caillou to play with. Caillou has much fun with it... until he breaks the train!—Anonymous
